go_data.justification: Megalin is involved in the reuptake of 25(OH)D in the kidneys.
Megalin-dependent uptake of the VDBP-25(OH)D complex into cells is limited to the proximal renal tubule.
Megalin is involved in the renal megalin/cubilin-mediated reuptake of 25(OH)D in the kidneys.
Vitamin D-dependent expression of megalin and cubilin has been found in the placenta.
